Package eu.digitisation.io

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CharFilter
    Transform text according to a mapping between (source, target) Unicode character sequences.
    StringNormalizer
    Normalizes strings: collapse whitespace and use composed form (see java.text.Normalizer.Form)
    TextContent
    Creates a StringBuilder with the (normalized) textual content in a file.
    UnicodeReader
    Transformations between Unicode strings and codepoints
    WordScanner
    A simple and fast text scanner which reads words from a file and performs the tokenization oriented by information-retrieval requirements.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FileType
    Supported input file types
